sentences.sentence: Weak acids ionize partly (ionize) in water to give hydrogen ion.
sentences.translation: 弱酸在水中部份电离(电离)，放出氢离子。

sentences.sentence: Weak alkalis ionize partly ( ionize ) in water to give hydroxide ion.
sentences.translation: 弱碱在水中部份电离，放出氢氧离子。

sentences.sentence: Too many charge concentrate at a sharp point may ionize the air and produced electric wind.
sentences.translation: 太多电荷集中在尖角时，会令空气电离，产生电风。
